subject: Research Paper Deadline Reminder
body:
Dear Student,

This is a reminder about your upcoming research paper submission. Please ensure you:

1. Submit the final draft by December 15th
2. Include all required citations and bibliography
3. Review the formatting guidelines on the course website
4. Schedule a meeting with me if you need feedback before submission

The paper should be 15-20 pages and follow APA format.

Best regards,
Dr. Smith
